ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Thanks to Richard Pearson for his comments on an early draft. Many thanks to the Kenya Rangelands Wild Dog and Cheetah Project and all their funders and field team for data collection and for making this work possible—particularly Stefanie Strebel and Helen O’Neill. We thank the Kenya Wildlife Service and Kenya National Council for Science and Technology (permit NACOSTI/P/14/9920/1659) for research permission. The project followed the ethical standards of the journal, and was approved by the Zoological Society of London. The authors have no conflicts of interest to declare. Funding for this work was provided by NERC through the London NERC DTP.
